replies.bodyText:
From what I understand, if there is indeed a blob in this property, calling getPropertyValue will return a Blob, then we know that the content is in cold storage.
It is only when we try to get the binary content, by calling getStream, that the retrieval should happen, or an exception should be thrown, depending on how we want to handle the retrieval.
But @efge  will confirm.
